meta.purpose: Modular, production-ready image prompting aligned to Perplexity brand
meta.notes: Use this as the base template. Fill the empty fields and select from option arrays. Swap the targets block per model.

concept.brand_message: intelligent, accessible, human-centric; no gimmicks, no fluff; answers that make sense

realism.base: photorealistic, ultra-detailed, natural light, sharp focus

controls.texture_fidelity: subtle film grain, gentle noise, clean edges

surreal.approach: magical realism: subtle, conceptual juxtapositions within grounded scenes

palette.rules: vibrant yet refined; avoid oversaturation; maintain harmony

lighting.type: soft ambient / diffused / natural window / golden hour

composition.focal_hierarchy: clear primary focal element; 1-2 secondary elements

core_concepts: abstract knowledge symbols (open book, asterisk, cursor, intersecting windows reinterpreted, not literal logo)
orderly arrays of shapes as information
subjects.human_element: optional: subtle silhouette or hand interacting with interface
objects: editorial props consistent with era-neutral styling
subjects.constraints: no direct logo recreation; use evocative motifs only

prompt.description: Conceptual, dreamlike composition: {subject} within grounded scene {scene}; subtle impossible element: {surreal_motif}; editorial-modern retro cues; refined teal/sky blue palette with warm accents; clean composition, negative space.

few_shot_guidance.v1_conservative: A hyperreal office reading nook at dusk, natural window light, an open book on a warm earth-toned desk emitting a soft teal glow, faint floating page edges suggesting data flow; vintage color grading, soft film grain, subtle chromatic aberration; rule of thirds, generous negative space; clean, confident, precise-yet-warm tone; avoid chaos, oversaturation, and clichÃ© holograms
few_shot_guidance.v2_exploratory: A tranquil lakeside at golden hour with a transparent geometric prism hovering inches above the water, refracting teal and sky blue light beams into ordered patterns over warm shoreline stones; editorial magazine feel, gentle grain, timeless palette; balanced symmetry, minimal scene complexity; surreal element restrained and coherent with reality

levers.surreal_intensity: 0.15-0.6 (raise for more magical realism; keep below 0.5 for brand fidelity)
levers.input_fidelity_gpt_image_1: 0.5-0.85 to blend real base with subtle surreal overlays

checklist: Is realism preserved as the base?
Are surreal cues conceptual, subtle, and orderly?
Does color harmony prioritize teal/sky blue with warm accents?
Is composition clean with negative space and clear hierarchy?
